sent_inference: I enjoy going sailing with my father.
I don't like eating out at upscale places.
Two of the movies were funny.
The player was skillful or hardworking.
Some of the shirts were striped.
sent_context: John and Bob were talking about sailing yesterday.
John and Bob were talking about restaurants yesterday.
Bob and John were talking about the weather during a recent trip.
A year ago, Bob and John were talking about a particular student they used to teach.
Yesterday, John and Bob were talking about the movies at a local theater.
Last week, John and Bob were talking about a player in a recent football game.
Last month, Bob and John were talking about the selection of shirts at a local store.
A few days ago, John and Bob were talking about a particular cookie at a local bakery.
expt_aim: To see how fluent one is with English sentences.
